entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
